text: navu a bhavana (ka'aba)vannu janarigagi, paraspara ottu seruva hagu suraksita sthalavagi madidevu. Ibrahimaru ninta sthanavannu nivu namajhina sthalavagi balasiri (endu navu adesisiddevu). Mattu tavaph (pradaksine) maduvavaru, ‘i'atikaph’ maduvavaru, baguvavaru hagu sastangaveraguvavarigagi nanna bhavanavannu nirmalavagidabekendu navu ibrahim mattu isma'ilarige adesa nididdevu
